dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S2655 IS: EARLY Act Reauthorization of 2014
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Klobuchar (for herself and Mr. Vitter) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

form.official-title: To reauthorize the Young Women’s Breast Health Education and Awareness Requires Learning Young Act of 2009.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the EARLY Act Reauthorization of 2014.

section.header: Reauthorization of the Young Women’s Breast Health Education and Awareness Requires Learning Young Act of 2009
section.text: Section 399NN(h) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 280m(h)) is amended by striking 2010 through 2014 and inserting 2015 through 2019.
